Spent caustic bụ ihe ngwọta na-akpata ihe mkpofu nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nke agwụla ma gharazi aba uru (ma ọ bụ meefu)
A na-eji sodium hydroxide ma ọ bụ potassium hydroxides, mmiri, na mmetọ eme ihe na-emefu ihe

Ndị na-emerụ emerụ erichapụla ọtụtụ sodium (ma ọ bụ potassium) hydroxide ma si otú a na-emefu mmanya na-egbu egbu, dịka ọmụmaatụ, n'otu ngwa H2S (gas) na-ehichapụ na NaOH (mmiri) iji mepụta NaHS (aq) na H2O (  l), si otú ahụ na-eri caustic.
Ihe na-emebi emebi bụ mmiri na-adịghị mma nke siri ike ịgwọ na usoro mmiri na-enweghị isi
Dị ka ọ na-adịkarị, a na-ewepụ ihe ahụ site na mgbawa dị elu na biotreatment, injection miri emi, incineration, mmiri ikuku oxidation, Humid Peroxide Oxidation ma ọ bụ usoro ndị ọzọ pụrụ iche
A na-ewepụ ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ihe ndị na-akpata ethylene a na-emefu site na ikuku ikuku ikuku.
